content: I'm glad I could help with organizing and storing your Pokémon TCG collection. It's always exciting to have a system in place to showcase and enjoy your collection. Speaking of collections, I was thinking about my new Iron Man Funko Pop from the Marvel collection that I got at the comic-con event last weekend, and I realized I need to find a way to display it nicely on my office desk. Do you have any suggestions for display stands or risers that would work well for Funko Pops?
